name.zh: 保温午餐包/便当手提包（多颜色）

description.en: An insulated lunch/bento tote with a structured shape and easy carry handles. Features a zip-around wide opening and thermal lining to help keep food fresh—ideal for lunch boxes and meal-prep containers. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), insulation/lining spec, size, logo patch, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 保温午餐包/便当手提包，包型挺括，手提便携。拉链全开结构，内置保温层/隔热内里，帮助保持食物温度与新鲜度，适合餐盒与便当盒。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、保温内里规格、尺寸、Logo 工艺、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Thermal Lining: Aluminum foil / PEVA (customizable; wipe-clean option)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
保温层：PE 泡棉/EPE（可定制）
内里：铝膜/PEVA（可定制；可选易清洁内里）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK

en.Opening: Zip-around wide opening for easy access
en.Use Case: Lunch box, bento, meal prep, picnic
en.Customization: Colors, fabric, insulation/lining, size, logo, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.保温结构: 保温层 + 隔热内里（规格可定制）
zh.适用场景: 午餐便当、餐盒、备餐、野餐
zh.可定制: 配色面料、保温内里、尺寸、Logo、口袋、拉链五金、包装
